import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute, Router } from '@angular/router'; import { Local } from 'src/app/interfaces/local'; import { LocalService } from 'src/app/services/local.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-stores-list', templateUrl: './stores-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./stores-list.component.css'] }) export class StoresListComponent { localList: Local[] = []; id: string = ''; mostrarListaProductos: boolean = false; constructor( private localService: LocalService, private route: ActivatedRoute, private router: Router ) { this.route.params.subscribe(params => { this.id = params['userId'] ? params['userId'].toString() : ''; }); } ngOnInit(): void { this.obtenerTiendas(); } obtenerTiendas() { this.localService.getlocalsByVendedorId(this.id).subscribe(response => { this.localList = response; }); } verTienda(localId: number | undefined) { // Verificar que localId no sea undefined antes de mostrar la lista de productos if (localId !== undefined) { // Mostrar la lista de productos this.mostrarListaProductos = true; } } }
